Basicdetails: This affordable evergreen cotton Shirt is super comfy. The Solid white Color is effortless and versatile. The shirt is lightweight, long-lasting, breathable and moisture-wicking , making a must in your wardrobe. Slay your look with this refreshing peice on a Beach or a casual evening party .The shirt features Regular Collar, Full Sleeves , Self Fold Placket , Round Cuff and Embroidery at Pockets best for semi casual look
certifications: Organic Content Standard, Global Organic Textile Standard, Oeko-Tex , ISO 14001, Recycled Claimed Standard ,ISO 9000, Bluesign
details: This style has been created by ethical procurement of raw materials . The set of suppliers who supplied raw materials for the development are committed towards the cause of environmental and social responsibility.
